title: Casino Critique
author: Casino Critique
content: At Casino Critique we are looking for a Lead Graphic Design. Possible roles:Create graphic/icon for our platformCollaborate with Review and content team to create graphic for review and article pages.Collaborate with Tipster team and create graphic for pagesWork together and lead our graphic and front end designer/developerCreate graphic for social channels.In short, you will be responsible to look after our graphic design department.We will prefer established forum member so that we don't have to look for much about your background. However we are open to anyone who has good portfolio in the relevant filed. If you have knowledge about gambling industry then it will be considered as an advantageÂ  but not necessary. Salary/rewards will be discusses in details with interested applicants. Leave us your Telegram and a short speech about why should we have you with us. Thank you.

comments.author: sr22398
comments.body: Hello, I am interested in your requirement.Please reach me at Skype or Email.Skype - cis.sethEmail - seth@cisinlabs.comThanksSeth R
